TopicTitle: [1.12.x] [BG] HabTech2 | Stockalike ISS Parts | 1.0.0 - The Final Update

Articles.Content: Maybe I've found a bug: when timewarping, the truss complex (your xtruss as shown in my album above) literally destroy the craft. It first disassembles, then wrecks everything. It's definetely that because I've tried without it (removing the truss complex from ISS, leaving only Russian and US Segment) and it timewarps very smoothly. A suggestion: Maybe including adapters on your modules? Because adding them it's necessary for a nice ISS replica but it adds a lot to the part count (2x on every US module, so Unity, Destiny, Harmony, Tranquility, Kibo and Columbus= 12 more parts).

9 minutes ago, JoseEduardo said:

are you using the nvidia plugin for photoshop? it also lets you just overwrite the DDS file

Up until now I didn't think there was a Mac version but I've just had a look and found one. Thanks!

4 minutes ago, trooperMNG said:

Maybe I've found a bug: when timewarping, the truss complex (your xtruss as shown in my album above) literally destroy the craft. It first disassembles, then wrecks everything. It's definetely that because I've tried without it (removing the truss complex from ISS, leaving only Russian and US Segment) and it timewarps very smoothly. A suggestion: Maybe including adapters on your modules? Because adding them it's necessary for a nice ISS replica but it adds a lot to the part count (2x on every US module, so Unity, Destiny, Harmony, Tranquility, Kibo and Columbus= 12 more parts).

That's very strange. What KSP version are you using? Are we talking physics warp or on-rails? I have a test craft in orbit to look out for this sort of issue and have never encountered it. 

Adapters I will leave separate to allow for people stacking modules together to make new ones. In 1.1 12 parts makes little to no difference!

17 minutes ago, benjee10 said:

+1 to the ISS YouTube series idea.

Well, I'll do it, I started to write out the whole series and it will definitely be over 10 videos. Idk how long they will be, but it all depends on whether or not I include the fat (Same item docking, P3&P4 truss and S3&S4 truss for instance) that is below the already removed fat (full launches, rendezvous). I'd also like some input on whether or not you'd like it voiced or just text, for reference, I sound very pre-pubescent higher pitched kid like, because well I am a very pre-pubescent higher pitched kid. If it's fine, but there is some resistance, I will make a transcript of all the maneuvers, so people can mute the video and just read what happens as it happens. Plus, people can translate if they are native to something other than English.

I will be doing an overview video of the mods I'll be using for assistance in the building of the station (basically IR for the robotic arms, Cormorant Aeronology for the shuttle parts, Tantares, HabTech, and maybe some visual stuff to make screenshots less bland. 

I will also make a video about flying the shuttle, making it, docking it, etc.

 

Shuttle Progress is.... Going Well? Your DIRECT RS-25s overheat before orbit and I had to make a water landing, which believe it or not, ksp shuttles fit well for because empty S-wings have a lot of buoyancy. Playing 1.0.5.

1.0.5. Maybe tomorrow I'll try with my updated 1.1 prerelease

I know this is an odd request given the contents and goal of the mod, but is there any way you could make a 1.25m and 0.9357m inline parachutes? Ones to go under the APAS and CBM docking ports for crew/resupply craft?

May have a bug:
Crew transfer on 1.1.0.1224x64 on windows does not happen on the labs. Right click on crew containing part (like the Mk2 crew cabin), select transfer crew and they won't go to the labs. They will go to the pressurized node, cupola, airlocks, and a few other parts, but it seems they will not go to the labs. It seems that the mouse-over highlight is not working either.

Further testing can move into labs with Ship Manifest and IVAs work correctly.
Biology lab has the camera placed in such a way it shows a black screen. Appears it's trying to show the Kerbal's face but the laptop is in-between.

Edited April 19, 2016 by helaeon

What do the .DS_Store files do?

3 minutes ago, RocketSquid said:

What do the .DS_Store files do?

Those are Mac OS metadata files.

Just now, ModZero said:

Those are Mac OS metadata files.

So, can I just get rid of them since I'm using windows?

2 minutes ago, RocketSquid said:

So, can I just get rid of them since I'm using windows?

I'm not the modder, but unless they did something very exotic, yes - regardless of OS, actually.

EDIT: OTOH, there's no real reason to do so - they're harmless.

Oh my, a Kottabos feature on Youtube ?

1 hour ago, Mokmo said:

Oh my, a Kottabos feature on Youtube ? 

 

Awesome!

Some of the shaders look really strange there compared to what I'm seeing, in general much darker (especially the interiors). I haven't tried it with the official release of 1.1, can anyone confirm that they look any different? Or is he using fallback part shaders (do they still exist in 1.1?) 

 

Also odd that the seats are missing in the airlock IVA. Some IVA configs reference Tantares props if it is installed (namely the fire extinguisher and small light) but I'm pretty sure the command chairs are stock and should show up. 

EDIT: Turns out they are Tantares props. I'm guessing most ISS builders will be using Tantares anyway so it shouldn't be too noticeable to most. 

Edited April 22, 2016 by benjee10
I cant transfer into the cupola.... anyone else having this problem???
